title: Neuer champion (idee)
body:
Also ich habe einen Champion designed auf Basis von Averdian einem Champion der aus League of Legends entfernt wurde (also seinen fähigkeits bildern ich habe den text auf englisch verfasst wer will kann mir gerne beim balancing helfen etc und weiter ideen hinzufügen. Ich hätte auch noch gerne namen für die passive da der derzeitige mir selbst nicht gefällt
Hier ist der champion text:


Passive:-Slowdown ([LVL1]:40sec-[LVL6]:30sec-[LVL11]:20sec-[LVL16]:10sec-cd) :
	When Averdians Astral Barrier is depleted, Astral Beam and Detonate get an 35% slow
    
Q: Astral Beam: (50mc on all Ranks) (10sec on all ranks)
	-Astral Beam deals 170/185/200/215/230 (+30%AP)   (to the first enemy hit
	and ads 40/45/50/55/60 to his shield with a maximum of 200/225/250/275/300
	added shield

W: :Astral Depletion (100/95/80/75/70 MC) (16/15/14/13/12 CD)
	-If an enemy champion nearby has an shield Averdian can cast Astral Depletion
	and steal 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% of the shield up to a maximum of 350 (+15%AP) This gets 
	added onto astral barriers power	

E: Detonate: (90/85/80/75/70/65 MC) (20/17/14/12/10 CD)
	-If detonate is activated it deals 150/160/170/180/190/200 + 
	[5% of astral barrier that gets depleted]
 	

R: Astral Barrier: (from lvl 1 Avaiable/can only be leveld up 2 times)
	- (25%/30%/35%) of his Mana is Turned Into an Shield 
	After 7.5sec out of Combat Astral Barrier will Regenerate to its Original State 
	
	-If Averdian is CCed during that time Astral Barriers regeneration will stop
	 and remain at the point where it currently is
	
	-Astral Barriers Power will return to the original (25%mana/30%mana/35%mana) 
	 power after dying


Basestats:
AD        :55-90 Base	
Movespeed :350
Leben     :500-2250
Lebensreg :6-16
Mana	  :400-1500
Manareg	  :5.7-12.5
Reichweite:575
MR	  :20-60
Armor	  :40
AS	  :0.65(+0%-30%)

Translations:
mc : Manacost
cd : cooldown
sec: seconds
